datasetParam.name: ds_pathway_id
datasetParam.help: Enter Pathway, Compound, Enzyme, Gene and/or Reaction IDs.

enumParam.name: exact_match_only
enumParam.help: Choose whether or not to only use exact EC Number matches in this query. Choosing No will match 2.7.1.1 with incomplete partial matches such as 2.7.-.-. Yes will ONLY match 2.7.1.1 with itself.

flatVocabParam.name: pathways_source
flatVocabParam.help: Use only pathways from the selected source in this query.

flatVocabParam.name: metabolic_pathway_id
flatVocabParam.help: Enter a Pathway ID (e.g. "ec00061") or Pathway name (e.g. "Fatty acid biosynthesis").

flatVocabParam.name: metabolic_pathway_id_with_compounds
flatVocabParam.help: Enter a Pathway ID (e.g. "ec00061") or Pathway name (e.g. "Fatty acid biosynthesis").

flatVocabParam.name: metabolic_pathway_id_with_genes
flatVocabParam.help: Enter a Pathway ID (e.g. "ec00061") or Pathway name (e.g. "Fatty acid biosynthesis").

stringParam.name: pathway_wildcard
stringParam.help: Asterisks can be used as wildcard characters in a Pathway (e.g. "ec001* or glyco*")

stringParam.name: single_identifier_id
stringParam.help: Enter any pathway or compound or enzyme or reaction ID (or its name).

sqlQuery.name: PathwaysSource
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct pa.pathway_source as display , pa.pathway_source as term , edr.external_database_release_id as internal from apidbtuning.pathwayattributes pa , sres.externaldatabase ed , sres.externaldatabaserelease edr where pa.EXTERNAL_DB_NAME = ed.NAME and edr.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_ID = ed.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_ID UNION select 'Any' as display, 'Any' as term, 1 as internal from dual

sqlQuery.name: MetbPathwaysList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pa.name ||' ('|| pa.source_id||') (' || pa.pathway_source || ')' as display , '('|| pa.source_id||') (' || pa.pathway_source || ')' as term , pa.pathway_id as internal FROM apidbtuning.pathwayattributes pa , sres.externaldatabase ed , sres.externaldatabaserelease edr WHERE pa.external_db_name = ed.name AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND (edr.external_database_release_id = $$pathways_source$$ OR $$pathways_source$$=1) UNION SELECT 'N/A' AS display, 'N/A' AS term, 0 AS internal FROM dual

sqlQuery.name: MetbPathwaysWithCompoundsList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT name ||' ('|| source_id ||')' as display, name ||' ('|| source_id ||')' as term, pathway_id as internal FROM sres.pathway UNION SELECT 'N/A' AS display, 'N/A' AS term, 0 AS internal FROM dual

sqlQuery.name: MetbPathwaysWithGenesList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT pa.name ||' ('|| pa.source_id||') (' || pa.pathway_source || ')' as display , '('|| pa.source_id||') (' || pa.pathway_source || ')' as term , pa.pathway_id as internal FROM apidbtuning.pathwayattributes pa , apidbtuning.transcriptpathway tp , sres.externaldatabase ed , sres.externaldatabaserelease edr WHERE tp.pathway_id = pa.pathway_id AND pa.external_db_name = ed.name AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND (edr.external_database_release_id = $$pathways_source$$ OR $$pathways_source$$=1) UNION SELECT 'N/A' as display, 'N/A' as term, 0 as internal FROM dual

sqlQuery.name: MetbPathwayIDsWithGenesList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT n.description ||' ('|| n.name||')' as display, n.name as term, n.network_context_id as internal FROM apidb.NetworkContext n, dots.Transcript t, dots.translatedAaFeature taf, sres.enzymeClass ec, dots.aaSequenceEnzymeClass asec, ApidbTuning.GeneAttributes ga, apidb.networkrelationship nr, apidb.networkrelationshiptype nrt, ApiDB.NetworkRelContext nrc, ApiDB.NetworkRelContextLink nrl, apidb.networknode nn WHERE ga.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id AND taf.aa_sequence_id = asec.aa_sequence_id AND asec.enzyme_class_id = ec.enzyme_class_id AND nn.display_label = ec.ec_number AND nr.associated_node_id = nn.network_node_id AND nrc.network_relationship_id = nr.network_relationship_id AND nrt.network_relationship_type_id = nrc.network_relationship_type_id AND nrl.network_rel_context_id = nrc.network_rel_context_id AND nrc.network_context_id = n.network_context_id
